sn12.31:1.2: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
sn12.31:3.1: Imassa nu kho, sāriputta, saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn12.31:3.2: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto tuṇhī ahosi.
sn12.31:4.1: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi …pe…

sn12.31:7.3: Bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn12.31:7.5: Tadāhārasambhavanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā āhārasambhavassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn12.31:7.6: Tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati.

sn12.31:8.3: Bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti.

sn12.31:8.6: Tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati.
sn12.31:8.7: Tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā nirodhadhammassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti.
sn12.31:8.9: Iti kho, bhante, yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ pārāyane ajitapañhe:
sn12.31:10.1: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
